examplesDescription: No examples are known of the toy-stop regal form of Cornemuse or

examples.name: Zampogna (3-pipe bagpipe), Solo; Trapani, Italy; la Grassa 1836-46.
Cornamusa, manual; Chiesa di San Filippo, Castelfranco di Sopra, Italy; Bruschi 1652. This example is a regal, playing three notes imitating a bagpipe.
